name: The Sheepherding Dog
description:
The Sheepherding Dog

Robot invasion is upon us and they have one particular target - your sheep!

Take control of a loyal farm dog and herd all the sheep into safety through all dangers - spikes, evil lawn mowers and ruthless robots!

Tips:

  • your dog is immune to all hazards in the game, but your sheep are not!
  • you need at least 1.5 Star to unlock the next level
  • sheep tend to run to the opposite direction from you, but it might take them some time to turn to the right direction
  • sheep get easily spooked, that means they run the fastest when they first notice you
